attributes.action: remove the Knighthood from Fred Godwin, disgraced former CEO of RBS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir fred Godwin does not deserve to be a Sir. Failure should not be rewarded.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Honours Committee.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
